h2_title: Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: There’s more than a few attack combos he can launch at close range, including two-hit swipes, which are sometimes followed by a raised foot slam afterward. Later in the fight, he can extend this combo with more slashes before finally slamming his foot down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Bear_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Black Bear Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
There’s more than a few attack combos he can launch at close range, including two-hit swipes, which are sometimes followed by a raised foot slam afterward. Later in the fight, he can extend this combo with more slashes before finally slamming his foot down.
